item.title: ‘Miami Vice’ Reboot: Meet the 1981 Thriller That Inspired the Show’s Striking Look
item.description: ‘Diva’ cinematographer Philippe Rousselot visits ‘It Happened in Hollywood’ podcast to discuss the game-changing French crime drama.

item.title: From Catchy to Classic: 30 of the Most Memorable TV Theme Songs
item.description: From ‘Cheers’ to ‘The O.C.,’ ‘Succession’ and yes, of course, ‘Friends,’ The Hollywood Reporter rounds up the top tunes in television’s opening credits.
